hero.geminiPrompt: Create a very short tagline for a real estate portal, with a maximum of 7 words. It should be inviting and direct. The response MUST be in English. Examples of phrases I like: 'Find your property here', 'It all starts today', 'Welcome to Quallity Home Real Estate Portal', 'How about a new house?', 'Rent without bureaucracy', 'Shall we schedule a visit?'. Generate a new phrase in this style. Do not use quotes in the response.
hero.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser.
hero.geolocationError: Could not get your location. Please check your browser permissions.

listings.description: Explore our exclusive selection of properties that combine luxury, comfort, and prime location.

draw.title: Draw your search area
draw.description: Choose exactly the area you are looking for on the map.

publish.title: Publish your property for free
publish.description: Your first 2 ads are free. Houses, rooms, offices...

map.drawInstruction: Move the map to locate the area of interest before drawing the zone you're looking for

noResults.line1: No properties found in this area.
noResults.line2: Try drawing a larger area or in another location.

hideAddress.label: Want to hide the street and number? (optional)

sidebar.title: Useful information
sidebar.p1: Prepare the photos. If you don't have them yet, you can add them later. You won't get results without photos.
sidebar.p2: We offer you the first two ads for free so you can try our service. You can publish free ads for apartments, houses, land, commercial spaces, etc., until you sell or rent them.
sidebar.p3: Additionally, you can publish up to 5 free rooms in properties for sharing, which do not count towards the number of ads we offer.
sidebar.p4: To ensure the quality of our services, we charge a fee in the following cases:
sidebar.case1: advertisers with more than two properties
sidebar.case3: properties for sale for more than 1,000,000 euros
sidebar.case4: properties for rent for more than 2,500 â‚¬/month
